title: Drop 2 Of Madewell x Alexa Chung Offers It Girl Winter Looks
description: If you thought Madewell’s new arrivals were already a denim dreamscape, get ready to fall even harder for the brand’s second release in collaboration with Alexa Chung. Fourteen years after their first team-up, Madewell and Alexa Chung have reunited for a two-part collection that’s perfect for fall and winter dressing. While the first delivery in September offered wardrobe staples in denim and suede, this winter assortment brings corduroy and satin into the mix. Alongside styles that haven’t sold out from the first drop, this new 15-piece collection includes corduroy blazers, coats, trousers, and mini skirts; satin Western shirts; and classic straight-leg and bootcut jeans, which Chung has dubbed “dream jeans.” And luckily, they’re all versatile enough to be mixed and matched. Build a head-to-toe corduroy ‘fit, a double-denim Western-inspired outfit, or go full ‘70s by pairing suede and satin together. However you style your favorites, you’ll capture a bit of that It girl sensibility and vintage-loving vibe.This collaboration is bound to make waves and sell out quickly, so click through to shop the full collection, with Chung herself modeling in the campaign. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Madewell x Alexa Chung author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: Model and ‘00s It Girl Alexa Chung has teamed up with Madewell on a two-part fall collection full of denim, suede, corduroy, and satin. Shop the second drop of the Madewell collaboration now.

html:
Photo: Courtesy of Madewell.

If you thought Madewell’s new arrivals were already a denim dreamscape, get ready to fall even harder for the brand’s second release in collaboration with Alexa Chung. Fourteen years after their first team-up, Madewell and Alexa Chung have reunited for a two-part collection that’s perfect for fall and winter dressing. While the first delivery in September offered wardrobe staples in denim and suede, this winter assortment brings corduroy and satin into the mix. 

Alongside styles that haven’t sold out from the first drop, this new 15-piece collection includes corduroy blazers, coats, trousers, and mini skirts; satin Western shirts; and classic straight-leg and bootcut jeans, which Chung has dubbed “dream jeans.” And luckily, they’re all versatile enough to be mixed and matched. Build a head-to-toe corduroy ‘fit, a double-denim Western-inspired outfit, or go full ‘70s by pairing suede and satin together. However you style your favorites, you’ll capture a bit of that It girl sensibility and vintage-loving vibe.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

This collaboration is bound to make waves and sell out quickly, so click through to shop the full collection, with Chung herself modeling in the campaign. 

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
